DOC.brief_summary: To investigate biomarkers in prediction of cardiometabolic and other diseases of adults aged 20-60 years.
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of Chronic Disease Risk Factor in Adultsï¼šAn Observational Cohort Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study is a hospital-based, prospective cohort study to investigate biomarkers in prediction of cardiometabolic and other diseases of adults aged 20-60 years.
